Product title: Ausemku Shower Curtain Rod Tension - 26-76 Inch Never Rust Non-Slip Spring Tension Curtain Rod No Drilling Stainless Steel Curtain Rod Use Bathroom Kitchen（Silver）
Key Features: 【Never Rust】– Newest non-corrosion tech, does not rust under any environment, sturdy and durable, heavy-duty high-strength steel tube, won’t fall down, max load 30 lb. | 【Easy to Install】- The adjustable shower curtain rod is available from 26 to 76 inches. And 1 inch diameters shower curtain rod tube and sides with large 2 inch rubber mats, you can quickly and easily install the tension rod to expand or contract without drilling, screws or any tools. | 【Apply to All Surfaces】- It can be applied on all surfaces, including both smooth and rough surfaces like wallpaper, painted walls, tile walls, wooden frames, etc. Large rubber pads will not scratch or damage the installation surface. Removes cleanly without leaving marks. | 【Multipurpose】- The shower tension rod can also be used in other areas of the home, such as the bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, or balcony. Use it to hang privacy curtains in doorways or blackout curtains in bedroom windows. | 【Quality Service】- If you are dissatisfied with our shower curtain rod in any way, or if it is damaged during transportation, please contact our customer service staff. Our team will provide you with a replacement or refund service.
